steps.title: Navigate to the site offering streaming video you want to download.
steps.content: Navigate to the site offering streaming video you want to download. Thousands of websites stream media.

steps.title: Call up the video.
steps.content: Call up the video. Position the cursor over the address bar of your browser and click once to highlight the URL. In the Edit pull-down menu in your browser click Copy to copy the URL.

steps.title: Do a web search using the term "download streaming video website," "capture streaming video website" or a similar term.
steps.content: Do a web search using the term "download streaming video website," "capture streaming video website" or a similar term.

steps.title: Navigate to a site that offers video capturing and paste the URL of the video into the narrow, rectangular box.
steps.content: Navigate to a site that offers video capturing and paste the URL of the video into the narrow, rectangular box. Click "Download."

steps.title: Click "Run" when the dialog box opens on your computer.
steps.content: Click "Run" when the dialog box opens on your computer. Download a plug-in to enable the video capturing if the site requires it. Some sites offer to install a toolbar in your browser. Examine the options carefully when the set-up wizard appears and uncheck options you don't want.

steps.title: Examine the different types and qualities of video from the list that will appear after you click "Run."
steps.content: Examine the different types and qualities of video from the list that will appear after you click "Run." Choose the format and quality of video from the list and click to download it.

steps.title: Click on "Save" when the dialog box opens to save the video to your hard drive in a folder you designate.
steps.content: Click on "Save" when the dialog box opens to save the video to your hard drive in a folder you designate.

steps.title: Play the video now stored on your hard drive at your leisure.
steps.content: Play the video now stored on your hard drive at your leisure.

steps.title: Do a web search using a search term like "free browser extensions for downloading streaming" or something similar.
steps.content: Do a web search using a search term like "free browser extensions for downloading streaming" or something similar. You can make the search term specific by designating the browser you use. For example, type "Firefox extension for capturing streaming."

steps.title: Download an extension from those listed in the search engine.
steps.content: Download an extension from those listed in the search engine. You may set it up to have a toolbar displayed near the top of your browser. Remember the folder that you designate to store audio and video.

steps.title: Navigate to a website where you want to record streaming audio or video and play the content.
steps.content: Navigate to a website where you want to record streaming audio or video and play the content.

steps.title: Download streaming video by clicking the appropriate toolbar button.
steps.content: Download streaming video by clicking the appropriate toolbar button. Play the video whenever you want with a button on your browser toolbar, or open the folder on your computer where you stored the clip.

steps.title: Download streaming audio by clicking the appropriate toolbar button.
steps.content: Download streaming audio by clicking the appropriate toolbar button. In one popular extension, an equalizer appears and the audio plays while it is downloading. Use the toolbar to open the folder with the audio or open the folder on your hard drive and play it at your leisure.
